amendatorysection.catchline: Investigation or other proceeding; prohibited acts.
amendatorysection.para: It shall be unlawful for any person with respect to any investigation or other proceeding under the Securities Act of Nebraska to: (1) Alter, destroy, mutilate, or conceal; (2) make a false entry in or by any means falsify; or (3) remove from any place or withhold from investigators or officials any record, document, or electronic or physical evidence with the intent to impede, obstruct, avoid, evade, or influence the investigation or administration of any other proceeding under the act.
